description: The time is the French Revolution.there was a revolutionary who sent Louis XVI and Marie Antoinette to the beheading and was nicknamed the "Angel Chief of Death". His name was Saint-Juste. His brutal and gruesome executions of evil-doing aristocrats eventually led to a major turning point of the times, the "Revolution. This is the story of a man who killed the kingdom of France for love.
author: Sora Karin
